item.title: [Game Notes] Lost Cities
item.description: I bought Lost Cities on iOS after hearing about it on The Spelunky Showlike podcast. It’s the digital adaptation of the original board game by Reiner Knizia. It’s inspiring how much depth is packed into such simple rules. New strategies occur to me as I play, and it’s not always clear if I’m making the best move. I’m still working my way through the AI opponents, but I’m looking forward to playing against other online players.
